title: Accessibility problems
description: I am experiencing accessibility problems with the application. Specifically, I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas (such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) before it starts working.
OB: When I launch the Help view on Windows 2000, the tab key does not have any effect. It does not allow me to navigate within the Help view via the keyboard.
EB: The Help view should be improved to allow immediate navigation via the keyboard upon launch.
SR: Please ensure that the Help view can be accessed and navigated using the keyboard without the need for an initial mouse click.
